title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when selecting SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText emits a beep sound when the SWT.MULTI option is chosen. This behavior is unexpected and should be addressed.
OB: After selecting the SWT.MULTI option, the ControlExampleText component emits a beep sound. Additionally, clicking on other buttons also triggers the beep sound.
EB: The ControlExampleText component should not produce any sound when the SWT.MULTI option is selected or when interacting with other buttons.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Launch the ControlExampleText component.
2. Select the SWT.MULTI option.
3. Check if a beep sound is emitted.
4. Click on other buttons and observe if the beep sound is triggered again.
